title: 20 year old company name
content:
I tried also find my fonts, best sugestions are:

Wedding Text BT  
Kanzlei

But not one is the real deal, maybe anyone could help me out.

Thanks in advance

Font: 

 Sabbath Black 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134740/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

author: Schrulli

comments.content:
The two |a|s are slightly different, so I suspect this is calligraphy, not a typeface.

Here’s what Myfonts has for stencil blackletter (Sabbath Black by Emigre is vaguely similar):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/search/blackletter+stencil/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134740/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/blackletter+stencil/fonts/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/blackletter+stencil/fonts/")

Hey kthomps5.

I took one of those, Sabbath Black™ I like most.  
Hope my friend does also like it. ;)

Tank you for the help!
